markers.marker: Nugi-chan answers Akko's call for requests: her skirt.
Nugi-chan thinks Shiny Chariot was in a hentai.
Nugi-chan borrows flower lines to address Amalia.
Because Nugi-chan is a web site mascot, she knows that she is digital and has AI.
Nugi-chan comments that she can see female Corrin's panties.
Nugi-chan flirts with the player by suggesting that the two of them would make a cute couple.
Tracker to see if Nugi-chan's epilogue was earned in a game or accessed via the epilogue gallery.
If Nugi-chan's first hand is bad in a game with Elizabeth, she'll pretend to be pure and innocent (for a line).
Nugi-chan transports Elizabeth's "first blood" remark to a new context.
Nugi-chan expects that Elizabeth will lose first.
Nugi-chan invites the listener to imagine waking up to messy-haired Estelle.
Nugi-chan has one real "finished" line and a few more that are just banter.
Nugi-chan was once 12.5% of the game!
Hypocritically, Nugi-chan says that glove removal is a slap in the face.
Nugi-chan doesn't have a butt pose... yet.
Nugi-chan inappropriately suggests that she's interested in some babysitting from Kim Possible.
Nugi-chan wants Kizuna to take her bra off next, which she will.
Nugi-chan incorrectly claims that sexy bras are better than cute ones.
Busty Nugi-chan makes fun of petite Kizuna. Probably because Kizuna is cuter.
Kyu's outfit makes for good material. Not MUCH material, though.
A priestess wouldn't de-shawl? What about a fertility priestess?
Nugi-chan acts suspiciously about her interactions with her Webmaster and a collar.
What's no good for Leggy is good for Nugi-chan.
Leggy isn't sure how to play, but Nugi-chan can help.
Nugi-chan + Marinette = Frennch maid.
Nugi-chan recommends that Aimee shoots off her own skirt.
Nugi-chan recommends that Aimee shoots off Alice's dress.
Nugi-chan recommends that Aimee shoots off Alpha's dress.
Nugi-chan recommends that Aimee shoots off Ann's panties.
Nugi-chan recommends that Aimee shoots off Florina's panties
Nugi-chan recommends that Aimee shoots off Marinette's bra.
Nugi-chan recommends that Aimee shoots Moon.
Nugi-chan recommends that Aimee shoots off Nagisa's skirt.
Nugi-chan recommends that Aimee shoots off the panties of a goddess, but only if Palutena is playing.
Nugi-chan recommends that Aimee shoots off bindings, but only if Rinkah is playing.
Nugi-chan recommends that Aimee shoots off Weiss' dress.
Nugi-chan recommends that Aimee shoots off Zelda's dress.
Nugi-chan calls Mia an "Ace-high Attorney".
Nugi-chan teases Mia for her short appearance in her debut game.
Nugi-chan sarcasticly reacts to Miko's job offer.
Nugi-chan tries to extend Mistato's staring permission to flash photography.
Nugi-chan frets over Monika's suggestion that removed clothing is deleted.
When an embarrassed girl removes her first major item, Nugi-chan says "we've updated your privacy policy".
Nugi-chan wants to taste Raven.
Nugi-chan says she'll live-tweet Raven's stripping.
Remilia should let Nugi-chan if she's hiring new maid staff.
Nugi-chan mimics Sakuya's introduction of Remilia by introducing the player.
Nugi-chan's webmaster knows she's playing here.
Nugi-chan recommends not cheaping out on fabric when you wear a maid costume.
Nugi-chan makes a "dig" pun because Sakura is a zombie.
Sakura can make things up to Nugi-chan in Sakura's epilogue.
Nugi-chan thinks that Sakura is mocking her.
Nugi-chan is not actually a maid.
Nugi-chan makes a "Number One" pee joke.
Nugi-chan remarks that Sakura is brave to put her bare feet on the bedroom's floor.
Nugi-chan invites Sakura to take off her clothes to assess her potential as a strip poker pro.
Nugi-chan in her Swimwear Server outfits has a tray of drinks to last Sei three rounds
Nugi-chan could cosplay Belfast.
Nugi-chan meets the "Nelson" comparison halfway with a pun.
Ideally, the flames would burn off a person's entire outfit.
Nugi-chan makes "SPH" remarks when a male player reveals a small crotch. She has the same comments for male NPCs but does not set a marker to remember this.
Nugi-chan's bad hand doesn't compare to a lifetime of disappointment.
Nugi-chan compares the player's small size to her lipstick.
Like the player, Nugi-chan sometimes suffers from the "Submit Query" image loading placeholder.
Nugi-chan shows her butt at Zoey's request.
Nugi-chan encourages Zoey to keep masturbating.
Nugi-chan suggests a threesome: her, Zoey, and the player.
